channel.title: Myrtle Beach South Carolina - Wildfire
channel.description:
http://www.wyff4.com/news/19258492/detail.html
I just got home from school evacuation. Its like 9/11 out there. We were evacuated due to smoke and the approaching fire.
Gives me some time to get to 91 fletching :D
They were going to send everyone who didnt get a ride home by 10:30 to another school :eek:. I started hallin' ass.
We've already seen a few helicopters go over with river water to help put it out, and now theirs a threat from falling ambers that are starting more fires. [s] Might not have school tomorrow either [/s] No skewl :D

item.title: Myrtle Beach South Carolina - Wildfire

item.description:
@haticks wrote:

You live pretty close to me…I was there like a week ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Myrtle Beach South Carolina - Wildfire
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Pepper2 Dr_Pepper
item.description:
@Dr_Pepper2 wrote:

Hope everybody will be alright, and my prayers go out to all the people who lost their home , Hopefully I won’t have to evacuate later tonight, keeping my fingers crossed.

Read full topic
